title: About

Hello ðŸ‘‹,

In an age when online dating can be frustrating and demote confidence in people, Date My Mate is all about enjoying time with friends, promoting people, witnessing strangers open up and having fun.

We think there is value in watching genuine people put themselves out there. In an age where meeting people is increasingly done online, we want to provide an authentic, in-person experience for friend groups and social circles to interact and come together in the name of love and comedy. ðŸ¤— ðŸ¤©

We are always open for a chat, so send us a message on our [facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/Date-My-Mate-106605317589661/) and hopefully see you at the next event! ðŸ˜Ž
